subject: Public Speaking
title: Deindividuation in Crowds
description: A micro-lesson that makes Deindividuation in Crowds usable.

hook.text: In large crowds, individuals lose self-awareness. Emotions surge.

buildup.text: This is why stadiums, rallies, and concerts feel electric.

discovery.text: Speakers can harness crowd energy for positive or negative ends.

twist.text: Ethical speakers channel crowd energy toward constructive action.

climax.text: Understanding crowd psychology is essential for large audiences.

punchline.text: Channel crowd energy constructively. It's powerful.
